documentation.text: @dev Prevents execution in the case of an emergency

@dev This function is called for all messages sent to
 this contract (there is no other function).
 Sending Ether to this contract will cause an exception,
 because the fallback function does not have the `payable`
 modifier.

LogEmergencyStop(address,bool).details: Indicates that the owner has performed an emergency stop

params._stop: Indicates whether to stop or resume

LogImageUploaded(address,string,string,s.details: Indicates that a user has uploaded a new image

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

params._stop: Switch the circuit breaker on or off

params._index: The index of the image to return

returns._0: The number of images associated with a given address

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

emergencyStop(bool).notice: Pause the contract.  It stops execution if certain conditions are met and can be useful  when new errors are discovered.

getImage(address,uint8).notice: Returns the image at index in the ownership array

getImageCount(address).notice: Returns the number of images associated with the given address
